name: ContaAzul Software LTDA
description: Developer of an online business management platform designed to manage the financials, stocks, and contacts of a company. The company's platform helps micro and small businesses in financial management, sales management, inventory management, invoicing, and billing, enabling entrepreneurs to focus on expanding their businesses and maximizing their profits.
one_liner: Developer of an online business management platform designed to manage the financials, stocks, and contacts of a company. The company's platform helps micro and small businesses in financial management, sales management, inventory management, invoicing, and billing, enabling entrepreneurs to focus on expanding their businesses and maximizing their profits.
